title: Research labs
content: What are the different research labs in pesu rr campus? And are there any eligibility criteria if I want to work in them?

comments.body:
Center for Data Science and Applied Machine Learning (CDSAML), CORI, Center for Cloud Computing and Big Data (CCBD), Parallel Systems Research Lab (PSRL, although I think it was shut down) exist and are the prominent ones. A few others are also there.

Most of them have some sort of entrance test based on aptitude and/or assignment, along with CGPA requirements, and most of them take in students only after 2nd year (CDSAML takes in after first year, maybe a few others do too). 

Although fair caution that the research labs here aren't really great since a lot of the good core and knowledgeable professors have left, leaving these clubs to unequipped and incapable professors.
